Class JED_Get_Distances_for_Residue_Pairs

  • java.lang.Object
    • jed.JED_Get_Distances_for_Residue_Pairs

  • public class JED_Get_Distances_for_Residue_Pairs
extends java.lang.Object
    JED class JED_Get_Distances_for_Residue_Pairs: Constructs the matrix of distances for the Residue Pairs subset.     • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Jama.Matrix get_Distances()
      Calculates the distances matrix for all the specified residue pairs and writes it to file
      Jama.Matrix Get_Ref_Distances()
      Calculates the distances matrix for the specified residue pairs in the reference structure and writes it to file

                                           java.lang.String dir,
                                           java.lang.String desc)
        Constructor to get the distances for the specified residue pairs
        Parameters:
        data - The original PDB coordinates matrix
        residues1 - The residue list specifying all the first elements of the pairs
        residues2 - The residue list specifying all the second elements of the pairs
        dir - The working directory
        desc - The job description
